parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: (primarily physical), I look, see, perceive, discern. A primary verb; to look at.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To cooperate with, work together. From sunergos; to be a fellow-worker, i.e. Co-operate.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From teleios; to complete, i.e. accomplish, or consummate.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary ergo; toil; by implication, an act.
